titleStmt.title: His Majesties letter to His Honourable Privy Council of Scotland, together with their answer
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London, and re-printed at Edinburgh by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the 12 day of February, 1686/7".
The King's letter accompanied his proclamation of the same date (Steele 2684, Scotland) tolerating house-meetings of Presbyterians and suspending laws against Catholics.
Also published in 1689 with title: The late King James his letter to his Privy Council of Scotland, with their answer, in reference to his indulgence ...
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
